overview:
Shaun is a living CollectiveX. He is the consummate connector â€” his stated purpose in life is to “invite people to the dance.” As head of our sales and business development efforts, he is focused on helping groups achieve a stronger return on involvement.

He brings an extensive background in sales, sales management and sales training to the CollectiveX team. After graduating from the U.S. Naval Academy (where he was known as Mr. Pep), Shaun’s sales successes have included Digex, CheckFree and USinternetworking, along with sales training positions at the Client Development Institute, High Performance Group and EntreQuest.

In his personal time, Shaun loves dancing and playing Scrabble with his wife, Sheila, and playing basketball and Guitar Hero with his son, Jack.
